ygData.messageBody:
Anyways, I will keep you all posted on what happens this weekend.

-----Original Message-----
From: Court Little [mailto:courtlend@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 1:45 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [[EQ-Monks] Digest Number 83]


From: "Court Little" <courtlend@...>

Hmmmm and exactly what is your problem? Are you upset because I didn't
proof read my e-mail like a college english paper? I am sorry you took
offense to my e-mail though I do understand it is easy to "act" tough in
e-mail. Ill just attribute your rant to juvenile behavior. Sorry about the
FSU thing.
